components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to MTS Network in Belarus

incident_updates.body: We are observing recovery in SMS delivery delays when sending messages to MTS Network in Belarus. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to MTS Network in Belarus. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Customers Unable to Access New Account Creation and MFA Reset Pages in Console

incident_updates.body: We have identified the root cause of the issue, preventing some customers from accessing pages within the Twilio Console to self-serve creation of additional accounts and reset their MFA enrollment. We are working with our vendor partner to resolve the issue. We recommend that any customer using Chrome as the browser to log in retry using Edge as the browser. We expect to provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Planned Maintenance for Flex Insights Historical Reporting

incident_updates.body: The Flex Insights Historical Reporting dashboards visualization partner in the US is conducting planned maintenance on Saturday, Jan 25th, 2025, at 1:00 AM Pacific Standard Time. The maintenance window is planned to take up to 13 hours. Maintenance is planned as no-downtime, but  there can be intermittent failures on loading Insights Historical Dashboards and ETLs uploads while the maintenance is in progress.

The SFR network in France is conducting a planned maintenance from 25 January 2025 at 13:00 PST until 25 January 2025 at 22:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to SFR France handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - MegaFon and Yota

incident_updates.body: The MegaFon and Yota networks in Russia are conducting a planned maintenance from 27 January 2025 at 12:00 PST until 27 January 2025 at 16:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to MegaFon and Yota Russia handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Austria, United Kingdom and Italy Account Security Carriers Partners Maintenance - Drei, Three and Wind Tre

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner Drei Austria, Three United Kingdom and Wind Tre Italy are conducting a planned maintenance from 27 January 2025 at 21:30 PST until 27 January 2025 at 23:30 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Drei Austria, Three United Kingdom and Wind Tre Italy customers.

Impacted Products: Verify Silent Network Auth, Lookup SIM Swap, Lookup Identity Match, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Verify Silent Network Auth

incident_updates.body:
We will be performing a brief TaskRouter database update in the US1 region, specifically adding a new column to an existing table as preperatory step for one of our upcoming newer features. The actual update is expected to be completed in less than a minute and should not affect your service. 

Monitoring: Our team will closely watch the system's performance during and after the update to ensure everything runs smoothly.

Contingency Plan: In the unlikely event of any issues, we are prepared to revert the changes immediately.

scheduled_maintenances.name: US SMS Carrier Maintenance - Small US Carriers

incident_updates.body: A subset of small networks in the US are conducting a planned maintenance from 28 January 2025 at 21:00 PST until 29 January 2025 at 02:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from small US carriers handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United Arab Emirates Voice Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our Voice carrier partner in the United Arab Emirates is conducting a planned maintenance from 29 January 2025 at 12:00 PST until 29 January 2025 at 18:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call disconnects or call failures from and to Twilio United Arab Emirates phone numbers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: US and Canada SMS and MMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our SMS and MMS carrier partner in US and Canada is conducting a planned maintenance from 29 January 2025 at 20:00 PST until 30 January 2025 at 00:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS and MMS to and from US and Canada handsets via subset of US and Canada long codes, short codes and toll free numbers.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Voice, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

Our SMS carrier partner in Australia is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 14 January 2025 at 12:00 PST until 26 January 2025 at 03:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Australia handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

14 January 2025 at 12:00 PST until 21 January 2025 at 00:00 PST
15 January 2025 at 12:00 PST until 22 January 2025 at 02:00 PST
15 January 2025 at 17:00 PST until 20 January 2025 at 07:00 PST
16 January 2025 at 14:00 PST until 23 January 2025 at 11:00 PST
19 January 2025 at 12:00 PST until 26 January 2025 at 03:00 PST
